Verify the modal title displays 'Confirm Action' with font size 24px and color #333333

Verify the error message 'Please fill in all required fields.' appears, has color #dc3545, font size 14px, background color #f8d7da, border 1px solid #f5c6cb, padding 10px, margin-top 15px, is visible, fades in with transition duration 300ms, has x coordinate 50, y coordinate 100, and aria-label 'Error message'

Verify the profile page has background color #f0f2f5

Click the dropdown menu

Verify there are exactly 3 list items (count) inside the dropdown
Verify the 'English' option has text 'English', font size 16px, and color #333333
Verify the selected item's text content is 'English' and has background color #e9ecef
Monitor the upload process on 'https://www.example.com/upload'
Verify the progress bar is visible, width 400px, height 10px, background color #e9ecef, border radius 5px, top position 150px, left position 100px, and aria-label 'Upload progress'
Verify the filled portion of the bar has background color #28a745, its value represents 75% completion, and its width transition takes 500ms ease-out

Verify the 'plus' button has text '+', is enabled, and its background color is #007bff
Verify the 'minus' button has text '-', is enabled, and its background color is #cccccc when the value is 1
Verify the color of the quantity text is #333333
Verify the selector has margin 10px on all sides

Verify there are exactly 5 links in the 'Company' section, each with font size 14px and color #ffffff

Verify the search button is visible, enabled, and has background color #007bff

Verify the notification toast appears, has text 'Order successfully placed!', background color #28a745, font color #ffffff, font size 16px, padding 15px 20px, margin 10px, is visible for 5s, animates out with opacity transition over 500ms, has top position 20px, right position 20px, border radius 8px, and aria-label 'Success notification'

Verify all cell text uses font size 14px and color #333333

Verify the 'Status' column cells are center aligned
